conditions.message: The Gateway has been scheduled by Envoy Gateway
Address assigned to the Gateway, 1/1 envoy replicas available
Sending translated listener configuration to the data plane

args:
cp /etc/livekit/livekit.yaml /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__API_KEY__/$API_KEY/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__API_SECRET__/$API_SECRET/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__STUNNER_USERNAME__/$STUNNER_USERNAME/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__STUNNER_PASSWORD__/$STUNNER_PASSWORD/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__REDIS_PASSWORD__/$REDIS_PASSWORD/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
/livekit-server --config /tmp/livekit.yaml
containers.name: livekit

conditions.message: Failed to process route rule 0 backendRef 0: service default/livekit-sig not found.

stringData.livekit.yaml:
keys:
  __API_KEY__: __API_SECRET__
log_level: info
port: 7880
redis:
  address: redis.default.svc.cluster.local:6379
  password: __REDIS_PASSWORD__

rtc:
  port_range_end: 60000
  port_range_start: 50000
  turn_servers:
    - credential: __STUNNER_PASSWORD__
      host: 34.13.38.98
      port: 3478
      protocol: udp
      username: __STUNNER_USERNAME__
  use_external_ip: false
turn:
  enabled: false

args:
cp /etc/livekit/livekit.yaml /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__API_KEY__/$API_KEY/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__API_SECRET__/$API_SECRET/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__STUNNER_USERNAME__/$STUNNER_USERNAME/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__STUNNER_PASSWORD__/$STUNNER_PASSWORD/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
sed -i "s/__REDIS_PASSWORD__/$REDIS_PASSWORD/g" /tmp/livekit.yaml
/livekit-server --config /tmp/livekit.yaml
containers.name: livekit
